snippet: How much does that college really cost? Colleges are now required to have online calculators to help answer that question, but they pose some challenges.
abstract: Many families have found that online college tuition calculators mandated by 2008 federal law provide as much confusion as clarity; quality of such calculators varies widely between schools, and there is no way to independently verify their results.
lead_paragraph: How much does that college really cost? Colleges are now required to have online calculators to help answer that question, but they pose some challenges.

headline.seo: College Cost Calculators Offer Clarity and Confusion
headline.main: Clarity and Confusion From Tuition Calculators
headline.print_headline: Clarity and Confusion From Tuition Calculators
